dataValueTemplate.annotation: select count(*) from openmrs.vac_vaccinations v,openmrs.vac_adverse_reactions r where v.vaccination_id = r.vaccination_id and r.retired = 0 and v.administered = 1 and DATE(r.logged_date) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(r.logged_date) <= :endOfPeriod and v.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) FROM openmrs.vac_vaccinations v,openmrs.person p WHERE (v.vaccine_id = 1 or v.vaccine_id = 2) and v.patient_id = p.person_id and v.retired = 0 and v.administered = 1 and 1 >= (YEAR(v.administration_date) - YEAR(p.birthdate)) and DATE(v.administration_date) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(v.administration_date) <= :endOfPeriod and v.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) FROM openmrs.vac_vaccinations v,openmrs.person p WHERE (v.vaccine_id = 1 or v.vaccine_id = 2) and v.patient_id = p.person_id and v.retired = 0 and v.administered = 1 and 1 < (YEAR(v.administration_date) - YEAR(p.birthdate)) and DATE(v.administration_date) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(v.administration_date) <= :endOfPeriod and v.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) FROM openmrs.vac_vaccinations v,openmrs.person p WHERE v.vaccine_id = 8 and 1 >= (YEAR(v.administration_date) - YEAR(p.birthdate)) and v.patient_id = p.person_id and v.retired = 0 and v.administered = 1 and DATE(v.administration_date) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(v.administration_date) <= :endOfPeriod and v.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) from openmrs.obs o,openmrs.person p where o.person_id = p.person_id and o.concept_id = 162105 and o.value_coded = 135851 and o.voided = 0 and 1 < (YEAR(o.obs_datetime) - YEAR(p.birthdate)) and DATE(o.obs_datetime) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(o.obs_datetime) <= :endOfPeriod and o.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) from openmrs.obs o,openmrs.person p where o.person_id = p.person_id and o.concept_id = 160055 and o.value_numeric = 1 and o.voided = 0 and DATE(o.obs_datetime) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(o.obs_datetime) <= :endOfPeriod and o.location_id = :locationId
